# 17.1.1

```{r}
study <- read.csv('hierarchical_betaBlocker.csv')
study
```

```{r}
dataList <- list(N=22, rt=study$rt, nt=study$nt, rc=study$rc, nc=study$nc, N=study$N)
```

```{r}
fit <- stan(file = 'BetaBlocker.stan', data=dataList, iter=1000, chain=4, seed=1)
```

```{r}
print(fit)
```
